title: A Bat Out of Hell
description: 119 is a product of biological engineering who has lived his entire life in an underground genetics lab. A compulsive daydreamer, he longs for the freedom to fly, but when he gets the opportunity to try his wings, the bat hybrid discovers that the outside world is a scary place and he hides in the safety of an underground cave.Brad's life is all about caving and exploring the unknown and untouched, but an accident leaves him trapped underground and he's sure he'll never see the light of day again. Rescue comes in a way he never expected. A stranger who calls himself Mace promises to lead Brad to safety--but instead puts him in greater danger.CONTENT ADVISORY: This title contains elements of rape or near rape.
author: Gale Stanley
